text: aur ahale kitaab kuchh aise bhee hain ki agar unake paas roope kee dher amaanat rakh do to bhee use (jab chaaho) vaise hee tumhaare havaale kar denge aur baaz aise hen ki agar ek asharfee bhee amaanat rakho to jab tak tum baraabar (unake sar) par khade na rahoge tumhen vaapas na denge ye (badamuaam lagee) is vajah se hai ki un ka to ye qaul hai ki (arab ke) jaahilo (ka haq maar lene) mein ham par koee ilzaam kee raah hee nahin aur jaan boojh kar khuda par jhooth (toofaan) jodate hain
